      • createLabel

        private javax.swing.JLabel createLabel(java.lang.String message,
                             int value)
        Creates a label with the following format : "Message : Value"
        Parameters:
        message - indicates the message, this could indicate what the value such as "Total Games Won"
        value - indicates the value of this attribute, for example you may have won "32" times
        Returns:
        the label created from the message and value together

      • createMainNameLabels

        private javax.swing.JLabel createMainNameLabels(java.lang.String difficulty)
        Creates the label corresponding to the name of this Entity
        Parameters:
        difficulty - indicates the type of entity
        Returns:
        a JLabel created for the specific entity, returns null if the difficulty does not match the avalible entities
